file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 36-10-02-04 - GROUND CONNECTION - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GROUND CONNECTION - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Engine-Starting Ground Coupling. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ENGINE-STARTING GROUND COUPLING ALL 36-10-02-000-801-A - REMOVAL ENGINE STARTING GROUND COUPLING ALL 36-10-02-400-801-A - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 36-10-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-10-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ENGINE-STARTING GROUND COUPLING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the engine-starting ground coupling. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272CR Fuselage rear section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the coupling I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open door 272CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Use a spatula to remove the sealant from around the fuselage, bolt and washers. (2) Remove the bolts (7). (3) Remove the washers (6) and (5). (4) Remove the engine-starting ground coupling (4). (5) Remove and discard the O-ring (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-10-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Remove and discard the packing (1). (7) Remove the duct (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-10-02 Page 3 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Engine-Starting Ground Coupling - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A DET. A ZONES 171 172 2 1. PACKING 2. DUCT 3. O’ RING 4. ENGINE STARTING GROUND COUPLING DET. B 5. WASHER (12) 6. WASHER (12) 7. BOLT (12) 1 2 1 TORQUE: 3.95-4.5 N.m (35-40 lb.in) 2 APPLY SEALANT RTV780 (FOR ALTERNATIVE EM145AMM360047C.DGN SEALANTS, REFER TO AMM 20-30-03/201). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 36-10-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 36-10-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ENGINE STARTING GROUND COUPLING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the engine-starting ground coupling. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - IPC 36-10-02 ENGINE STARTING GROUND COUPLING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272CR Fuselage rear section I D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench (Range: 0 -100 lb.in) To tighten the clamps available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Porous-point marker To make marks on the packing 1 available Commercially Plastic spatula To remove the old sealant 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) 780 Type II Class A Silicone Sealant AR To clean Commercially available Isopropyl alcohol (Fed. Spec. TT-I-735) the sur- face To clean Commercially available Methyl ethyl ketone (ASTM D 740) the sur- face EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 36-10-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) O-ring IPC 36-10-02 1/LRU Packing IPC 36-10-02 1/LRU H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the coupling I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the packing (1) to the duct (2). (2) Install the duct (2). (3) Install the O-ring (3) to the engine-starting ground coupling (4). (4) Install the engine-starting ground coupling (4) on the duct (2). (5) Install the washers (5) and (6). (6) Install the bolts (7) applying torque of 3.95−4.5 N.m (35−40 lb.in). (7) Apply fillet sealant (SRM -51-20-01). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close door 272CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 36-10-02 Page 6 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
